Wolaitta_Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi Muusee asaa Intte gita nagaraa oottideta shin hai taani GODAAKKO pude deriyaa kiyana geelladan intte nagaraa taani atto giissanaakkonne yaagiis

English_Sentences: and moses returned unto the lord and said oh this people have sinned a great sin and have made them gods of gold
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin Muusee GODAAKKO simmidi biidi hagaadan yaagiis Ha asai gita nagaraa oottiis eti banttayyo worqqaappe xoossata medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: yet now if thou wilt forgive their sin and if not blot me i pray thee out of thy book which thou hast written
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin hayyanaa hai eta nagaraa atto yaaga hegee xayikko neeni xaafido mazggabaappe tana qucca yaagiis

English_Sentences: and the lord said unto moses whosoever hath sinned against me him will i blot out of my book
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin GODAI zaaridi Muusa Taani ta mazggabaappe quccanaagee ta bolli nagaraa oottida asatu sunttaa

English_Sentences: therefore now go lead the people unto the place of which i have spoken unto thee behold mine angel shall go before thee nevertheless in the day when i visit i will visit their sin upon them
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hai baada ha asaa taani neeyyo yootido sohuwaa kaaletta ta kiitanchchaikka nena kaalettana shin taani qaxxayanau wodee gakkin eta eta nagaraa gishshau qaxxayana yaagiis

English_Sentences: and the lord plagued the people because they made the calf which aaron made
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooni worqqaappe maraa misiliyaa medhdhanaadan asai giddido gishshau GODAI asaa bolli gita boshaa yeddiis

English_Sentences: and the lord said unto moses depart and go up hence thou and the people which thou hast brought up out of the land of egypt unto the land which i sware unto abraham to isaac and to jacob saying unto thy seed will i give it
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis Neeninne neeni Gibxxeppe kessido asai ha sohuwaappe denddite denddidi Taani intte yaratussi immana yaagada wottido biittaa biite He biittai taani Abrahaamayyo Yisaaqayyoonne Yaaqoobayyo immana yaagada caaqqa wottido biittaa

English_Sentences: and i will send an angel before thee and i will drive out the canaanite the amorite and the hittite and the perizzite the hivite and the jebusite
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani intte sinttan kiitanchchaa kiittada Kanaaneta Amooreta Hiiteta Parzzeta Hiiwetanne Yaabuusata yedettana

English_Sentences: unto a land flowing with milk and honey for i will not go up in the midst of thee for thou art a stiffnecked people lest i consume thee in the way
Wolaitta_Sentences: Maattainne eessai goggiyo he biittaa biite SHin intte morggee zozzido asa gidido gishshau taani inttena ogiyan xaissargganau inttenaara biikke yaagiis

English_Sentences: and when the people heard these evil tidings they mourned and no man did put on him his ornaments
Wolaitta_Sentences: Asai he yashshiya oduwaa siyidi keehippe yeekkiis He wodeppe doommidi ubbaikka bar alleequwaa aattiyoogaa aggi bayiis

English_Sentences: for the lord had said unto moses say unto the children of israel ye are a stiffnecked people i will come up into the midst of thee in a moment and consume thee therefore now put off thy ornaments from thee that i may know what to do unto thee
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aissi giikko GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagi wottiis Israaeela hagaadan yaaga Intte morggee zozzido asa Taani inttenaara harai atto guutta wodiyaa biyaakkokka taani inttena xaissarggana Hai simmi intte alleequwaa kessirggite yaatobare taani inttena oottanabaa qachchana yaaga yaagiis

English_Sentences: and the children of israel stripped themselves of their ornaments by the mount horeb
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin Israaeelati Siinaa Deriyaappe doommidi bantta alleeqota kessi wottidosona

English_Sentences: and moses took the tabernacle and pitched it without the camp afar off from the camp and called it the tabernacle of the congregation and it came to pass that every one which sought the lord went out unto the tabernacle of the congregation which was without the camp
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee dunkkaaniyaa ekki ekkidi efiidi asai dunkkaanosaappe kareera haassidi toliis Tolin he dunkkaanee Gaittiyo Dunkkaaniyaa geetettidi xeesettiis GODAA oichchanau koyiya ubbai dunkkaanosaappe kareera deiya Gaittiyo Dunkkaaniyaa bees

English_Sentences: and it came to pass when moses went out unto the tabernacle that all the people rose up and stood every man at his tent door and looked after moses until he was gone into the tabernacle
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee he dunkkaaniyaa biido wode audenne asai ubbai denddidi ba dunkkaaniyaa penggen penggen eqqees eqqidi Muusee he dunkkaaniyaa gelana gakkanaashin a xeellees

English_Sentences: and it came to pass as moses entered into the tabernacle the cloudy pillar descended and stood at the door of the tabernacle and the lord talked with moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee Gaittiyo Dunkkaaniyaa giddo gelido wode shaaraa tuussai duge wodhdhees wodhdhidi GODAI Muuseera haasayishin he dunkkaaniyaa penggen takkees

English_Sentences: and all the people saw the cloudy pillar stand at the tabernacle door and all the people rose up and worshipped every man in his tent door
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHaaraa tuussaa he dunkkaaniyaa geliyo penggiyan beido wode ubban asai ubbai ba penggen penggen denddi eqqidi GODAAYYO goinnees

English_Sentences: and the lord spake unto moses face to face as a man speaketh unto his friend and he turned again into the camp but his servant joshua the son of nun a young man departed not out of the tabernacle
Wolaitta_Sentences: Asi ba laggiyaara haasayiyoogaadan GODAI Muuseera sinttan eqqidi haasayees Hegaappe guyyiyan Muusee asai dunkkaanidosaa guyye simmees shin a maaddiya yelagai Nawe naaa Yaasu Gaittiyo Dunkkaaniyaappe shaahettenna

English_Sentences: and moses said unto the lord see thou sayest unto me bring up this people and thou hast not let me know whom thou wilt send with me yet thou hast said i know thee by name and thou hast also found grace in my sight
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee GODAA hagaadan yaagiis Neeni tana Ha asaa kaaletta yaagadasa shin tanaara neeni oona kiittiyaakko tana erissabaakka Neeni Taani nena sunttan erais neeni tanan nashettadasa yaagadasa

English_Sentences: now therefore i pray thee if i have found grace in thy sight shew me now thy way that i may know thee that i may find grace in thy sight and consider that this nation is thy people
Wolaitta_Sentences: Neeni tana nashshidabaa gidikko taani nena erana malanne sinttanaukka nenan nashettada daana mala ne ogiyaa tana tamaarissa Ha asai ne asaa gidiyoogaa hassaya yaagiis

English_Sentences: and he said my presence shall go with thee and i will give thee rest
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin GODAI zaaridi Taani nenaara baana taani nena shemppissana yaagiis

English_Sentences: and he said unto him if thy presence go not with me carry us not up hence
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin Muusee a Neeni nunaara beennabaa gidikko hagaappe nuna yeddoppa

English_Sentences: for wherein shall it be known here that i and thy people have found grace in thy sight is it not in that thou goest with us so shall we be separated i and thy people from all the people that are upon the face of the earth
Wolaitta_Sentences: Neeni nunaara beennan xayikko tanaaninne ne asaani neeni ufaittidoogaa asai ubbai waani eranee Biitta ubban deiya hara asa ubbaappe tananne ne asaa dummayiyaabi harabi aibee yaagiis

English_Sentences: and the lord said unto moses i will do this thing also that thou hast spoken for thou hast found grace in my sight and i know thee by name
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin GODAI Muusa Taani nenan ufaittido gishshaunne nena ne sunttan eriyo gishshau neeni tana oichchidoogaa ubbaa taani oottana yaagiis

English_Sentences: and he said i beseech thee shew me thy glory
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin Muusee Yaanikko phooliya ne qonccettaa bonchchuwaa tana bessarkkii yaagiis

English_Sentences: and he said i will make all my goodness pass before thee and i will proclaim the name of the lord before thee and will be gracious to whom i will be gracious and will shew mercy on whom i will shew mercy
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin GODAI Taani ta phooliya bonchchuwaa qonccetta ubbaa ne sinttaara kanttissana ta geeshsha sunttaakka ne achchan awaajjana Taani GODAA taani maaranau koyiyoogeeta maarana qassi qarettanau koyiyoogeetuyyookka qarettana

English_Sentences: and he said thou canst not see my face for there shall no man see me and live
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin neeni ta somuwaa beakka aissi giikko ooninne tana beidi paxa deenna yaagiis

English_Sentences: and the lord said behold there is a place by me and thou shalt stand upon a rock
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Neeni zaallaa bolli eqqanau hagan ta matan sohoi deees

English_Sentences: and it shall come to pass while my glory passeth by that i will put thee in a clift of the rock and will cover thee with my hand while i pass by
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ta bonchchoi kanttiyo wode taani nena phalqqettida zaallaa giddon wottana wottada taani kanttana gakkanaashin ta kushiyan nena kammana

English_Sentences: and i will take away mine hand and thou shalt see my back parts but my face shall not be seen
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan taani ta kushiyaa diggin neeni ta zokkuwaa beana shin ta somoi beettanau bessenna yaagiis

English_Sentences: and the lord said unto moses hew thee two tables of stone like unto the first and i will write upon these tables the words that were in the first tables which thou brakest
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis Koiroogeeta milatiya naau shuchchata massada giigissa yaatobare taani he masettida shuchchatu bolli kase neeni menttido shuchchatu bollan deiya qaalata xaafana

English_Sentences: and be ready in the morning and come up in the morning unto mount sinai and present thyself there to me in the top of the mount
Wolaitta_Sentences: Wontto maallado pude Siinaa Deriyaa kiyanau giiga yaatada tanaara yan deriyaa huuphiyan gaitta

English_Sentences: and no man shall come up with thee neither let any man be seen throughout all the mount neither let the flocks nor herds feed before that mount
Wolaitta_Sentences: Nenaara ooninne kiyoppo woikko deriyaa bolli awankka beettoppo harai atto dorssaa wudee woikko mehiyaa wudeekka deriyaa sinttan heemettoppo yaagiis

English_Sentences: and he hewed two tables of stone like unto the first and moses rose up early in the morning and went up unto mount sinai as the lord had commanded him and took in his hand the two tables of stone
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Muusee koiro shuchchata milatiya naau shuchchata massiis massidi GODAI azazidoogaadan shuchchata ba kushiyan oiqqidi maallado guuraara pude Siinaa Deriyaa kiyiis

English_Sentences: and the lord descended in the cloud and stood with him there and proclaimed the name of the lord
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kiyin GODAI shaaran duge wodhdhidi aara yan eqqiis eqqidi GODAA yaagidi ba sunttaa awaajjiis

English_Sentences: and the lord passed by before him and proclaimed the lord the lord god merciful and gracious longsuffering and abundant in goodness and truth
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muuse sinttaara hagaadan yaagidi awaajjiiddi kanttiis Taani GODAA taani GODAA qaretainne maarotai kumido Xoossaa danddayanchchaa aggenna siiqoi daridoogaanne daro ammanettiyaagaa

English_Sentences: keeping mercy for thousands forgiving iniquity and transgression and sin and that will by no means clear the guilty visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children and upon the childrens children unto the third and to the fourth generation
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani ta aggenna siiquwaa shaatussi naagiyaagaa iitatettaa makkalaanne nagaraa atto yaagiyaagaa Gidikkokka mooranchchaa qaxxayennan aggennaagaa aawatu nagaraa gishshau naatanne naatu naata heezzantto yeletaanne oiddantto yeletaa gakkanaashin qaxxayiyaagaa yaagidi awaajjiis

English_Sentences: and moses made haste and bowed his head toward the earth and worshipped
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin Muusee sohuwaara biittan gufannidi goinniis

English_Sentences: and he said if now i have found grace in thy sight o lord let my lord i pray thee go among us for it is a stiffnecked people and pardon our iniquity and our sin and take us for thine inheritance
Wolaitta_Sentences: goinnidi Abeet Godau neeni tanan ufaittidabaa gidikko nunaara issippe hindda Hagee asai morgge zozzidabaa gidikkokka nu iitatettaanne nu nagaraa atto yaagada nuna ne asa ootta yaagiis

English_Sentences: and he said behold i make a covenant before all thy people i will do marvels such as have not been done in all the earth nor in any nation and all the people among which thou art shall see the work of the lord for it is a terrible thing that i will do with thee
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin GODAI hagaadan yaagiis Taani inttenaara maachchaa maacettais hagaappe kase saa ubban deiya kawotetta ubban hani erenna maalaalissiyaabaa ne asa ubbaa sinttan oottana taani GODAI intteyyo oottiyo oosoi ai keena maalaalissiyaabaakko neeni eta giddon deiyo asai beana

English_Sentences: observe thou that which i command thee this day behold i drive out before thee the amorite and the canaanite and the hittite and the perizzite and the hivite and the jebusite
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hachchi taani inttena azaziyo azazuwaa naagite intte sinttappe Amooreta Kanaaneta Hiiteta Parzzeta Hiiwetanne Yaabuusata taani yedettana

English_Sentences: take heed to thyself lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land whither thou goest lest it be for a snare in the midst of thee
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti intteyyo pire gidenna mala intte biyo biittan deiya asaara maachchaa maacettoppite

English_Sentences: but ye shall destroy their altars break their images and cut down their groves
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti yarshshiyo sohota qolite eti goinniyo shuchchatakka mentterettite qassi Asheero giyo eta macca xoossee misiletakka qanxxeretti olite

English_Sentences: for thou shalt worship no other god for the lord whose name is jealous is a jealous god
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani GODAI qanaatiya Xoossaa gidiyo gishshau taappe hara xoossatuyyo goinnoppite

English_Sentences: lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land and they go a whoring after their gods and do sacrifice unto their gods and one call thee and thou eat of his sacrifice
Wolaitta_Sentences: He biittan deiya asatuura aiba maachchakka maacettoppite aissi giikko eti tanan ammanettennan ixxidi bantta xoossata kaalliyo wodenne etayyo yarshshiyo wode eti inttenakka shoobbana shoobbin intte eta yarshshota maana

English_Sentences: and thou take of their daughters unto thy sons and their daughters go a whoring after their gods and make thy sons go a whoring after their gods
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi intte eta macca naatuppe dooridi intte attuma naatussi immana he wode he macca naati tanan ammanettennan ixxidi bantta xoossata kaalliiddi intte attuma naatakka banttaagaadan ootissana

English_Sentences: thou shalt make thee no molten gods
Wolaitta_Sentences: Intteyyo goinniyo xoossata aibippekka seerissidi medhdhoppite

English_Sentences: the feast of unleavened bread shalt thou keep seven days thou shalt eat unleavened bread as i commanded thee in the time of the month abib for in the month abib thou camest out from egypt
Wolaitta_Sentences: Oittaa Baalaa bonchchite taani inttena azazidoogaadan laappun gallassau irshshoi gelennan uukettida oittaa miite hegaakka intte Gibxxeppe kiyido Abiiba aginan oottite

English_Sentences: all that openeth the matrix is mine and every firstling among thy cattle whether ox or sheep that is male
Wolaitta_Sentences: uluwaappe baira yelettiya attuma naa ubbai tabaa intte mehe ubbaappekka boora gidin woikko dorssa gidin bairai tabaa

English_Sentences: but the firstling of an ass thou shalt redeem with a lamb and if thou redeem him not then shalt thou break his neck all the firstborn of thy sons thou shalt redeem and none shall appear before me empty
Wolaitta_Sentences: koiro yelettida hare maraa dorssa maraara laammada woza wozana xayikko a qooriyaa menttada wora Ne naatuppe baira yelettida attuma naa ubbaa woza Ooninne immiyoobaa oiqqennan mela kusheera ta sinttan beettoppo

English_Sentences: six days thou shalt work but on the seventh day thou shalt rest in earing time and in harvest thou shalt rest
Wolaitta_Sentences: Usuppun gallassaa oottite shin laappuntta gallassan shemppite goyiyo wodiyankka qassi kattaa cakkiyo wodiyankka laappuntta gallassan shemppite

English_Sentences: and thou shalt observe the feast of weeks of the firstfruits of wheat harvest and the feast of ingathering at the years end
Wolaitta_Sentences: Baira zerettida gisttiyaa intte cakkiyo wode Saaminttatu Baalaa bonchchite laittaa wurssetta kattaa shiishshiyo wodekka SHiishuwaa Baalaa bonchchite

English_Sentences: thrice in the year shall all your menchildren appear before the lord god the god of israel
Wolaitta_Sentences: Laittan heezzutoo Israaeela attuma asai ubbai Ubbaa Haariya GODAA Israaeela Xoossaa sinttan beettona

English_Sentences: for i will cast out the nations before thee and enlarge thy borders neither shall any man desire thy land when thou shalt go up to appear before the lord thy god thrice in the year
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kawotettata taani intte sinttappe yedettada kessana yaatada intte zawaa taani aassana GODAA intte Xoossaa sinttan intte laittan heezzutoo beettanau pude kiyiyo wode ooninne intte biittaa amottenna

English_Sentences: thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrifice with leaven neither shall the sacrifice of the feast of the passover be left unto the morning
Wolaitta_Sentences: Intte taayyo suutaa yarshshuwaa yarshshiyo wode irshshuwaa yeggidi uukkido oittaara yarshshoppite Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassaayyo yarshshido yarshshuwaappe maalladossi aibinne attoppo

English_Sentences: the first of the firstfruits of thy land thou shalt bring unto the house of the lord thy god thou shalt not seethe a kid in his mothers milk
Wolaitta_Sentences: Intte gaden baira kaxxida kattaappe koiro murutaa GODAA intte Xoossaa keettaa ehiite Deeshsha maraa a aayee maattan doissoppite yaagiis

English_Sentences: and the lord said unto moses write thou these words for after the tenor of these words i have made a covenant with thee and with israel
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa Taani nenaaranne Israaeela asaara maachchaa maacettiyoi ha qaalati giyo maaraana gidiyo gishshau ha qaalata xaafa yaagiis

English_Sentences: and he was there with the lord forty days and forty nights he did neither eat bread nor drink water and he wrote upon the tables the words of the covenant the ten commandments
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee katta meennaaninne haatta uyennan oitamu gallassaanne oitamu qammaa GODAARA yan gamiis gamidi maachchaa qaalata tammu azazota masettida shuchchan xaafiis

English_Sentences: and it came to pass when moses came down from mount sinai with the two tables of testimony in moses hand when he came down from the mount that moses wist not that the skin of his face shone while he talked with him
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee GODAARA haasayiiddi gamido gishshau he naau masettida shuchchata i ba kushiyan oiqqidi Siinaa Deriyaappe duge wodhdhido wode a somoi phooliis shin i hegaa eribeenna

English_Sentences: and when aaron and all the children of israel saw moses behold the skin of his face shone and they were afraid to come nigh him
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooninne Israaeela asai ubbai Muusa xeellidi a somoi phooliyoogaa beidosona beidi eti akko shiiqanau yayyidosona

English_Sentences: and moses called unto them and aaron and all the rulers of the congregation returned unto him and moses talked with them
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin Muusee eta xeesiis xeesin Aarooninne yaaaa kaalettiya halaqati ubbai akko simmidosona simmin i eta haasayissiis

English_Sentences: and afterward all the children of israel came nigh and he gave them in commandment all that the lord had spoken with him in mount sinai
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Israaeela asai ubbai akko shiiqiis shiiqin GODAI ayyo Siinaa Deriyan immido azazo ubbaa i etau immiis

English_Sentences: and till moses had done speaking with them he put a vail on his face
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee etau yootiyoogaa wurssido wode ba somuwaa naxalan kammiis

English_Sentences: but when moses went in before the lord to speak with him he took the vail off until he came out and he came out and spake unto the children of israel that which he was commanded
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin Muusee GODAA sintti aara haasayanau geliyo wode audenne kiyana gakkanaashin naxalaa ba somuwaappe qaarirggees Hegaappe kiyidi GODAI azazidobaa Israaeela asau yootees

English_Sentences: and the children of israel saw the face of moses that the skin of moses face shone and moses put the vail upon his face again until he went in to speak with him
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yootiyo wode eti a somoi phooliyaagaa beidosona Hegaa gishshau Muusee GODAARA haasayanau baana gakkanaashin ba somuwaa zaarettidikka naxalan kammees

English_Sentences: and moses gathered all the congregation of the children of israel together and said unto them these are the words which the lord hath commanded that ye should do them
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee Israaeela asaa yaaaa muliyaa shiishshidi hagaadan yaagiis Intte oottana mala GODAI azazidobai hagaa

English_Sentences: six days shall work be done but on the seventh day there shall be to you an holy day a sabbath of rest to the lord whosoever doeth work therein shall be put to death
Wolaitta_Sentences: Saaminttaa giddon usuppun gallassa xalaalan oosuwaa oottite shin laappuntta gallassai intteyyo geeshsha gallassa GODAAYYOOKKA shemppo Sambbata He gallassi ai oosonne oottiya uri ooninne haiqqanau bessees

English_Sentences: ye shall kindle no fire throughout your habitations upon the sabbath day
Wolaitta_Sentences: Sambbata gallassan intte son son tama eettoppite yaagiis

English_Sentences: and moses spake unto all the congregation of the children of israel saying this is the thing which the lord commanded saying
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee Israaeela maabarau muliyau hagaadan yaagiis GODAI hagaadan yaagidi azaziis

English_Sentences: take ye from among you an offering unto the lord whosoever is of a willing heart let him bring it an offering of the lord gold and silver and brass
Wolaitta_Sentences: Intteyyo deiyaabaappe GODAAYYO immiyoobaa ehiite GODAAYYO immiyoobaa ehaanau koyiya ooninne worqqaa biraa nahaasiyaa

English_Sentences: and blue and purple and scarlet and fine linen and goats hair
Wolaitta_Sentences: salo milatiya qacinaa ochchaa teeraa milatiya qacinaa shololla zoo qacinaanne liiqo liinuwaa deeshshaa agoziyaa

English_Sentences: and rams skins dyed red and badgers skins and shittim wood
Wolaitta_Sentences: dorssa orggiyaa calaa zoo qalamiyan yeggi kessidoogaa irppaniyaa guuganttaa

English_Sentences: and oil for the light and spices for anointing oil and for the sweet incense
Wolaitta_Sentences: xomppiyaassi wogaraa zaitiyaa tiyettiyo zaitiyaanne ixaanaa sawettiya qimamiyaa

English_Sentences: and onyx stones and stones to be set for the ephod and for the breastplate
Wolaitta_Sentences: eefuudiyaaninne tiran wottiyoogan yeggiyo maragidiyaa geetettiya shuchchatanne hara phooliya alo shuchchata eho

English_Sentences: and every wise hearted among you shall come and make all that the lord hath commanded
Wolaitta_Sentences: Intte giddon deiya kushe hiilla eranchcha ubbati yiidi GODAI azazido ubbaa oottona

English_Sentences: the tabernacle his tent and his covering his taches and his boards his bars his pillars and his sockets
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa a kammiyo dunkkaaniyaanne a kammiyoogaa qapheta xagaageta hiraqota tuussatanne eti eqqiyo gedeta

English_Sentences: the ark and the staves thereof with the mercy seat and the vail of the covering
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taabootaanne a tookkiyo kasota atto giyo sohuwaa qumuwaanne Taabootaa genttiyo magalashuwaa

English_Sentences: the table and his staves and all his vessels and the shewbread
Wolaitta_Sentences: xaraphpheezaanne a tookkiyo kasota a miishshata ubbaanne GODAA sinttan wottiyo geeshsha oittaa

English_Sentences: the candlestick also for the light and his furniture and his lamps with the oil for the light
Wolaitta_Sentences: xomppiyaa wottiyo ballaanne an maaraara deiya xomppeta miishshata xomppiyaa zaitiyaa

English_Sentences: and the incense altar and his staves and the anointing oil and the sweet incense and the hanging for the door at the entering in of the tabernacle
Wolaitta_Sentences: ixaanaa cuwayiyo saaxiniyaanne a tookkiyo kasota tiyettiyo zaitiyaanne sawiya ixaanaa Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa penggiyaa magalashuwaa

English_Sentences: the altar of burnt offering with his brasen grate his staves and all his vessels the laver and his foot
Wolaitta_Sentences: xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaanne a nahaasiyaa zazzariyaa a tookkiyo kasotanne a miishshata ubbaa nahaasiyaappe oosettida meechcha keriyaanne a wottiyoogaa

English_Sentences: the hangings of the court his pillars and their sockets and the hanging for the door of the court
Wolaitta_Sentences: so dabaabaa godaa magalashota tuussatanne eta gedeta dabaabaa soo giddo geliyo penggiyaa magalashuwaa

English_Sentences: the pins of the tabernacle and the pins of the court and their cords
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa toliyo xisheta dabaabaa giddo xishetanne eta wodorota

English_Sentences: the cloths of service to do service in the holy place the holy garments for aaron the priest and the garments of his sons to minister in the priests office
Wolaitta_Sentences: qeeseti Geeshsha Sohuwan oottiiddi maayanau dadettida maayota qeesee Aarooninne a naati qeesetettaa oosuwaa oottiiddi maayiyo maayota oottona yaagiis

English_Sentences: and all the congregation of the children of israel departed from the presence of moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Israaeela maabarai ubbai Muuse sinttappe kiyiis

English_Sentences: and they came every one whose heart stirred him up and every one whom his spirit made willing and they brought the lords offering to the work of the tabernacle of the congregation and for all his service and for the holy garments
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kiyidi immanau koyidaageetinne eta wozanai eta imma imma giidoogeeti ubbai yiidosona yiidi Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaassi a giddon oottiyo ooso ubbaunne geeshsha maayuwau koshshiyaabaa ubbaa ehiidosona

English_Sentences: and they came both men and women as many as were willing hearted and brought bracelets and earrings and rings and tablets all jewels of gold and every man that offered offered an offering of gold unto the lord
Wolaitta_Sentences: Immana koyida attuma ubbainne macca ubbai yiidi worqqaappe medhdhido alleeqota haittaa gutichchata migidota qooriyan aattiyo gujjumatanne worqqaa alleeqota ehiidosona ehiidi GODAASSI imo oottidi immidosona

English_Sentences: and every man with whom was found blue and purple and scarlet and fine linen and goats hair and red skins of rams and badgers skins brought them
Wolaitta_Sentences: Salo milatiya qacinai ochcha teera milatiya qacinai shololla zoo qacinai woikko liinuwaa giyo liiqo qacinai woikko deeshshaa agozee dorssa orggiyaa calaa zoo qalamiyan yeggi kessidoogee woikko irppanee deiyo asai ubbai ekkidi ehiis

English_Sentences: every one that did offer an offering of silver and brass brought the lords offering and every man with whom was found shittim wood for any work of the service brought it
Wolaitta_Sentences: Biraa woikko nahaasiyaa immanau danddayiya ubbai bantta imuwaa GODAAYYO immidosona qassi guuganttai deiyo asai ubbai dumma dumma oosuwau guuganttaa ehiis

English_Sentences: and all the women that were wise hearted did spin with their hands and brought that which they had spun both of blue and of purple and of scarlet and of fine linen
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kushe hiillaa eriya maccaasai ubbai bantta kushiyan suqqido salo milatiya qacinaa ochchaa teeraa milatiya qacinaa shololla zoo qacinaanne liiqo liinuwaa ehiidosona

English_Sentences: and all the women whose heart stirred them up in wisdom spun goats hair
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassikka imuwaa immanau koyida maccaasai ubbai deeshshaa agoziyaa daddidosona

English_Sentences: and the rulers brought onyx stones and stones to be set for the ephod and for the breastplate
Wolaitta_Sentences: Halaqati eefuudiyaaninne tiran wottiyoogan wottiyo maragidiyaanne hara bonchchettida shuchchata ehiidosona

English_Sentences: and spice and oil for the light and for the anointing oil and for the sweet incense
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti qassikka xomppiyaayyo sawiya ixaanaayyoonne tishshaassi haniya wogaraa zaitiyaanne qimamiyaa ehiidosona

English_Sentences: the children of israel brought a willing offering unto the lord every man and woman whose heart made them willing to bring for all manner of work which the lord had commanded to be made by the hand of moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Israaeelati asai ubbai attumainne maccai eti oottanaadan GODAI Muuse baggaara azazido oosuwau haniya imuwaa ubbaa bantta dosan GODAYYO ehiidosona

English_Sentences: and moses said unto the children of israel see the lord hath called by name bezaleel the son of uri the son of hur of the tribe of judah
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee Israaeela asaa hagaadan yaagiis Beite GODAI Yihudaa zariyaappe Huura naaa naaa Uura naaa Baxaalieela dooriis

English_Sentences: and he hath filled him with the spirit of god in wisdom in understanding and in knowledge and in all manner of workmanship
Wolaitta_Sentences: Dooridi GODAI a Xoossaa Ayyaanan hiillan akeekaaninne ooso ubbaa oottiyo eran kunttiis

English_Sentences: and to devise curious works to work in gold and in silver and in brass
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegeekka hiillan oosuwaa halchchuwaa kessidi worqqaappe biraappenne nahaasiyaappe dumma dummabaa i oottanaassa

English_Sentences: and in the cutting of stones to set them and in carving of wood to make any manner of cunning work
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka alo shuchchaa massidi giigissanaassa mittaa massanaassanne ubba qommo oosuwaa hiillan oottanaassa

English_Sentences: and he hath put in his heart that he may teach both he and aholiab the son of ahisamach of the tribe of dan
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa bollikka qassi ayyoonne Daana zariyaa Ahisamaaka naaa Oholiaabayyo hara asaa tamaarissiyo eratettaa immiis

English_Sentences: them hath he filled with wisdom of heart to work all manner of work of the engraver and of the cunning workman and of the embroiderer in blue and in purple in scarlet and in fine linen and of the weaver even of them that do any work and of those that devise cunning work
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti ubba qommo ooso oottanaadan hiillan oottiyaageeta oosuwaa halchchuwaa kessiyaageeta salo milatiya qacinan ochchaa teeraa milatiya qacinan shololla zoo qacinaaninne liinuwaa qacinan alleequwaa daddiyaageetanne shimainneta gidanaadan GODAI eta eratettan kunttiis Eti ubbaikka ubba qommo oosuwaa luxidi eriya eranchcha gididosona

English_Sentences: then wrought bezaleel and aholiab and every wise hearted man in whom the lord put wisdom and understanding to know how to work all manner of work for the service of the sanctuary according to all that the lord had commanded
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Baxaalieeli Oholiaabinne Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa keexxana mala GODAI eraa immin luxida asai ubbai GODAI azazidoogaadan ubbabaa oottana yaagiis

English_Sentences: and moses called bezaleel and aholiab and every wise hearted man in whose heart the lord had put wisdom even every one whose heart stirred him up to come unto the work to do it
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Muusee Baxaalieela Oholiaabanne GODAI dumma eratettaa immidoogeeta oosuwaa oottanau yaana koyiya ubbaa xeesidi shiishshiis

English_Sentences: and they received of moses all the offering which the children of israel had brought for the work of the service of the sanctuary to make it withal and they brought yet unto him free offerings every morning
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHiiqidaageeti Israaeela asai Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa oottanau ehiido imo ubbaa Muuseppe ekkidosona Qassi asai ba dosan coo immiyo imotaa maallado maallado gujji gujjidi ehiyoogaa aggibeenna

English_Sentences: and all the wise men that wrought all the work of the sanctuary came every man from his work which they made
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa oottiya erai kumido asai ubbai bantta oosuwaa wottiishshidi

English_Sentences: and they spake unto moses saying the people bring much more than enough for the service of the work which the lord commanded to make
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusa hagaadan yaagidosona Asai GODAI azazido oosuwaayyo koshshiyaagaappe keehi dariyaagaa ehiiddi deees yaagidosona

English_Sentences: and moses gave commandment and they caused it to be proclaimed throughout the camp saying let neither man nor woman make any more work for the offering of the sanctuary so the people were restrained from bringing
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin Muusee dunkkaanidosan deiya asaassi hagaadan yaagidi azaziis Naaantto ai attumaasikka ai maccaasikka Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa oosuwaassi immiyoobaa immanau ehooppo yaagin asai ehiyoogaa aggi bayiis

English_Sentences: for the stuff they had was sufficient for all the work to make it and too much
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aissi giikko eti ehiido imotai ooso ubbaa oottanau gididi palahees

English_Sentences: and every wise hearted man among them that wrought the work of the tabernacle made ten curtains of fine twined linen and blue and purple and scarlet with cherubims of cunning work made he them
Wolaitta_Sentences: Oosuwaa oottiyaageetu giddoppe hiillaa dariyaageeti ubbati liiqo liinuwaappenne salo milatiya ochcha teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappe dadettida tammu magalashotuppe Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa giigissidosona He magalashotu bolli bollaara issi hiillai kiruubetu misiliyaa sikkiis

English_Sentences: the length of one curtain was twenty and eight cubits and the breadth of one curtain four cubits the curtains were all of one size
Wolaitta_Sentences: Magalashoti ubbai issi likke gididi geesai laatamanne hosppun wara gomppai wara

English_Sentences: and he coupled the five curtains one unto another and the other five curtains he coupled one unto another
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ichchashu magalashota issippe gattidi sikkidosona qassi hankko attida ichchashu magalashotakka etadan oottidosona

English_Sentences: and he made loops of blue on the edge of one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling likewise he made in the uttermost side of another curtain in the coupling of the second
Wolaitta_Sentences: Issippe gattidi sikkido magalashotuppe issi magalashuwaassi wurssetta gaxan salo milatiya carqqiyaappe siireta medhdhidosona Qassi issippe gaitetti sikettida hankko magalashuwankka hegaadan oottidosona

English_Sentences: fifty loops made he in one curtain and fifty loops made he in the edge of the curtain which was in the coupling of the second the loops held one curtain to another
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti issippe gaittida issi magalashuwaa bolli ishatamu siireta qassi issippe gaittida hankko magalashuwaa bollikka ishatamu siireta medhdhidosona He siireti ubbaikka issoi issuwaassi baazzan deoosona

English_Sentences: and he made fifty taches of gold and coupled the curtains one unto another with the taches so it became one tabernacle
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan worqqaappe ishatamu qapheta medhdhidosona Medhdhidi Dunkkaanee issuwaa gidana mala he magalashotu gaxaa gaxaa he qaphetun oittidosona

English_Sentences: and he made curtains of goats hair for the tent over the tabernacle eleven curtains he made them
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa bollaara kammiyo dunkkaaniyaassi tammanne isiini magalashota deeshshaa agoziyaappe daddidosona

English_Sentences: the length of one curtain was thirty cubits and four cubits was the breadth of one curtain the eleven curtains were of one size
Wolaitta_Sentences: Tammanne isiini magalashotikka issi likke issi issi magalashuwaa geesai hasttamu wara gomppai oiddu wara

English_Sentences: and he coupled five curtains by themselves and six curtains by themselves
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ichchashu magalashota issi baggaara usuppun magalashota qassi hankko baggaara gattidi sikkidosona

English_Sentences: and he made fifty loops upon the uttermost edge of the curtain in the coupling and fifty loops made he upon the edge of the curtain which coupleth the second
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan gatti sikkido magalashotuppe issi magalashuwaa gaxan ishatamu siireta medhdhidosona Qassikka gatti sikkido hankko magalashotuppe wurssetta magalashuwaa gaxan ishatamu siireta medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and he made fifty taches of brass to couple the tent together that it might be one
Wolaitta_Sentences: Naau baggaara deiya magalashota gattidi issi Dunkkaane oottanau nahaasiyaappe ishatamu qapheta medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and he made a covering for the tent of rams skins dyed red and a covering of badgers skins above that
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan dunkkaaniyaa kammanau dorssa orggiyaa calaa zoo qalamiyan yeggi kessidoogaa giigissidosona qassi a bollaara kammanau irppaniyaa giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and he made boards for the tabernacle of shittim wood standing up
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa xagaagiyoobata sitti giida guuganttaappe kessidosona

English_Sentences: the length of a board was ten cubits and the breadth of a board one cubit and a half
Wolaitta_Sentences: Issi issi xagaagiyau geesai tammu wara gomppai issi waranne bagga

English_Sentences: one board had two tenons equally distant one from another thus did he make for all the boards of the tabernacle
Wolaitta_Sentences: Issi issi xagaagiyaassi issuwaa issuwaara gatti oittiya naau marata medhdhidosona Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa xagaageta ubbaakka hegaadan oottidosona

English_Sentences: and he made boards for the tabernacle twenty boards for the south side southward
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaayyo tohossa baggaara laatamu xagaageta medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and forty sockets of silver he made under the twenty boards two sockets under one board for his two tenons and two sockets under another board for his two tenons
Wolaitta_Sentences: Medhdhidi issi issi xagaagiyaayyo naau gedeta muleera oitamu gedeta biraappe giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and for the other side of the tabernacle which is toward the north corner he made twenty boards
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaayyo huuphessa baggaara laatamu xagaageta medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and their forty sockets of silver two sockets under one board and two sockets under another board
Wolaitta_Sentences: Medhdhidi issi issi xagaagiyaayyo naau gedeta muleera oitamu gedeta biraappe giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and for the sides of the tabernacle westward he made six boards
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaayyo guyye gaxan arggo baggaara usuppun xagaageta medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and two boards made he for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa guyye gaxan deiya zoozetuyyo naau xagaageta giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and they were coupled beneath and coupled together at the head thereof to one ring thus he did to both of them in both the corners
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ha naau zoozetun deiya xagaageti xaphuwaappe xeeraa gakkanaashin daabula gididi biidi xeeran issi sagaayuwan geli oiqettidosona Eti naaaikka hegaadan hanidosona

English_Sentences: and there were eight boards and their sockets were sixteen sockets of silver under every board two sockets
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa gishshau issi issi xagaagiyaayyo garssaara naau naau gedeti deoosona muleera hosppun xagaagetinne biraappe oosettida tammanne usuppun gedeti deoosona

English_Sentences: and he made bars of shittim wood five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi eti guuganttaappe hiraqota kessidosona Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaayyo issi bagga miyyiyan deiya xagaagetuyyo ichchashu hiraqota

English_Sentences: and five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle and five bars for the boards of the tabernacle for the sides westward
Wolaitta_Sentences: qassi hankko bagga miyyiyan deiya xagaagetussi ichchashu hiraqota giigissidosona Hegaadankka Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaayyo guyye arggo baggaara wurssetta gaxan deiya xagaagetuyyo ichchashu hiraqota medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and he made the middle bar to shoot through the boards from the one end to the other
Wolaitta_Sentences: Giddo hiraqoi xagaagetussi giddo ginaara ha gaxaappe ya gaxaa gakkanau kantti kiyanaadan oottidosona

English_Sentences: and he overlaid the boards with gold and made their rings of gold to be places for the bars and overlaid the bars with gold
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xagaageta worqqan sheeshshidi hiraqoti aadhdhiyo sagaayota worqqaappe medhdhidosona qassi hiraqotakka worqqan sheeshshidosona

English_Sentences: and he made a vail of blue and purple and scarlet and fine twined linen with cherubims made he it of cunning work
Wolaitta_Sentences: Salo milatiya ochcha teera milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe issi magalashuwaa oottidosona He magalashuwaa bolli issi hiillai kiruubetu misiliyaa sikkiis

English_Sentences: and he made thereunto four pillars of shittim wood and overlaid them with gold their hooks were of gold and he cast for them four sockets of silver
Wolaitta_Sentences: Magalashuwaayyo oiddu tuussata guuganttaappe giigissidi worqqan sheeshshidosona Yaatidi worqqa kaqqiyoogeeta etayyo giigissidosona Qassi tuussata essiyo oiddu gedeta biraappe medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and he made an hanging for the tabernacle door of blue and purple and scarlet and fine twined linen of needlework
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo penggiyaassi salo milatiya ochcha teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe dadettidaagaa xilppiyaa alleeqissiyaagan magalashuwaa giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and the five pillars of it with their hooks and he overlaid their chapiters and their fillets with gold but their five sockets were of brass
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi eta kaqqiyo ichchashu tuussata kaqqiyo ballaara deiyaageeta medhdhidosona Tuussatu gumbbotanne qachchiyoogeeta worqqan sheeshshidosona Qassi eta gedeta ichchashatakka nahaasiyaappe medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and bezaleel made the ark of shittim wood two cubits and a half was the length of it and a cubit and a half the breadth of it and a cubit and a half the height of it
Wolaitta_Sentences: Baxaalieeli guuganttaa mittaappe Taabootaa giigissiis He Taabootai zananaa naau waranne baggaa aduqqees gomppai issi waranne baggaa aakkees geesaikka issi waranne baggaa xoqqees

English_Sentences: and he overlaid it with pure gold within and without and made a crown of gold to it round about
Wolaitta_Sentences: He Taabootaa giigissidi suwaanne kariyaa walahi bainna worqqan sheeshshiis yuushuwaakka worqqa tigettan yuushshi aattiis

English_Sentences: and he cast for it four rings of gold to be set by the four corners of it even two rings upon the one side of it and two rings upon the other side of it
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi oiddu worqqa sagaayota tigidi Taabootaayyo oiddu gedetun issi baggaara naau sagaayota qassi hankko baggaara naau sagaayota aattiis

English_Sentences: and he made staves of shittim wood and overlaid them with gold
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatidi guuganttaappe kasota kessiis Kessidi etakka worqqan sheeshshiis

English_Sentences: and he put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark to bear the ark
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taabootaa tookkanau Taabootaa miyyiyan deiya sagaayotun kasota aattiis

English_Sentences: and he made the mercy seat of pure gold two cubits and a half was the length thereof and one cubit and a half the breadth thereof
Wolaitta_Sentences: Walahi bainna worqqaappe naau waranne baggaa aduqqiya issi waranne baggaa aakkiya atto giyo sohuwaa qumuwaa medhdhiis

English_Sentences: and he made two cherubims of gold beaten out of one piece made he them on the two ends of the mercy seat
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qumuwaayyo wurssetta naau bagga gaxan naau kiruubeta qoxettida worqqaappe medhdhiis

English_Sentences: one cherub on the end on this side and another cherub on the other end on that side out of the mercy seat made he the cherubims on the two ends thereof
Wolaitta_Sentences: Issi kiruubiyaa issi bagga gaxan naaantto kiruubiyaa hankko bagga gaxan naaaakka qumuwaara gatti oittidi medhdhiis

English_Sentences: and the cherubims spread out their wings on high and covered with their wings over the mercy seat with their faces one to another even to the mercy seatward were the faces of the cherubims
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kiruubeti bantta qefiyaa denttidi atto giyo sohuwaa kammiyo qumuwaa bantta qefiyan kuwayi wottidosona qassi issoi issuwaakko simmi uttidi qumuwaa xeelloosona

English_Sentences: and he made the table of shittim wood two cubits was the length thereof and a cubit the breadth thereof and a cubit and a half the height thereof
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi zananai naau wara gomppai issi wara geesaikka issi waranne bagga gidido xaraphpheezaa guuganttaappe medhdhiis

English_Sentences: and he overlaid it with pure gold and made thereunto a crown of gold round about
Wolaitta_Sentences: Medhdhidi walahi bainna worqqan sheeshshiis Yuushuwaakka worqqa tigettaa yuushshi aattiis

English_Sentences: also he made thereunto a border of an handbreadth round about and made a crown of gold for the border thereof round about
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka gomppai takkaaro gidiya shaashiyaa a bolli yuushshi aattiis Yaatidi a bolli worqqaa tigettaa yuushshiis

English_Sentences: and he cast for it four rings of gold and put the rings upon the four corners that were in the four feet thereof
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatidi Taabootaa tookkanau giigiya oiddu worqqa sagaayota medhdhiis medhdhidi oiddu gedeti merettido oiddu zoozetuura oittiis

English_Sentences: over against the border were the rings the places for the staves to bear the table
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xaraphpheezaa tookkanau kasota aattiyo sagaayoti xaraphpheezau shaashiyaa lanqqiyan shiiqidi merettidosona

English_Sentences: and he made the staves of shittim wood and overlaid them with gold to bear the table
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xaraphpheezaa tookkiyo kasotakka guuganttaappe kessidi worqqan sheeshshiis

English_Sentences: and he made the vessels which were upon the table his dishes and his spoons and his bowls and his covers to cover withal of pure gold
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka xaraphpheezaa bolli wottiyo dumma dumma miishshata walahi bainna worqqaappe medhdhiis hegeetikka sainetanne cilppata qassi ushshaa yarshshuwaa tigiyo keretanne xuuata

English_Sentences: and he made the candlestick of pure gold of beaten work made he the candlestick his shaft and his branch his bowls his knops and his flowers were of the same
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Baxaalieeli xomppiyaa wottiyo ballaa qoxettida walahi bainna worqqaappe medhdhiis he ballaa essiyo gediyaakka giddo toomaakka qoxxido worqqaappe medhdhiis A qururuusota a kukkumotanne a ciishshata ubbaa aara issippe oittidi medhdhiis

English_Sentences: and six branches going out of the sides thereof three branches of the candlestick out of the one side thereof and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side thereof
Wolaitta_Sentences: Miyyiyaara usuppun marata medhdhiis marata heezzaa issi baggaara qassi heezzaa hankko baggaara kessiis

English_Sentences: three bowls made after the fashion of almonds in one branch a knop and a flower and three bowls made like almonds in another branch a knop and a flower so throughout the six branches going out of the candlestick
Wolaitta_Sentences: Usuppun maratussikka huuphiyan huuphiyan issi issi kukkumoinne ciishshati deiyo lauziyaa ciishshaa milatiya wanccaa medhdhiis

English_Sentences: and in the candlestick were four bowls made like almonds his knops and his flowers
Wolaitta_Sentences: xomppiyaa wottiyo ballaassi giddo toomai kukkumotinne ciishshati deiyo lauziyaa ciishshaa milatiya oiddu wanccan alleeqetti uttiis

English_Sentences: and a knop under two branches of the same and a knop under two branches of the same and a knop under two branches of the same according to the six branches going out of it
Wolaitta_Sentences: Naaai naaai issippe waattan deiyo heezzu maratuppe garssaara issi issi kukkumoi meretti uttiis

English_Sentences: their knops and their branches were of the same all of it was one beaten work of pure gold
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kukkumotinne marati ubbai xomppiyaa wottiyo ballaara issippe oiqetti issuwaa gididi walahi bainna worqqaappe qoxettidi merettidosona

English_Sentences: and he made his seven lamps and his snuffers and his snuffdishes of pure gold
Wolaitta_Sentences: I qassi xomppiyaa wottiyo ballau laappun xomppeta xomppiyaa toissiyo qaphetanne eta wottiyoobata walahi bainna worqqaappe medhdhiis

English_Sentences: of a talent of pure gold made he it and all the vessels thereof
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xomppiyaa wottiyo ballaanne an goettiyo miishshaa ubbaa medhdhanau hasttamanne ichchashu kilo giraame gidiya walahi bainna worqqaa wurssiis

English_Sentences: and he made the incense altar of shittim wood the length of it was a cubit and the breadth of it a cubit it was foursquare and two cubits was the height of it the horns thereof were of the same
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi ixaanaa cuwayiyo saaxiniyaa guuganttaappe medhdhiis Ayyo oiddu zoozee deees zananai issi wara gomppai issi wara geesai naau wara A kacetikka aara issuwaa gididi oiqetti merettidaageeta

English_Sentences: and he overlaid it with pure gold both the top of it and the sides thereof round about and the horns of it also he made unto it a crown of gold round about
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ayyo bolla doonaa oiddu miyye ubbaanne a kaceta walahi bainna worqqan sheeshshidi a yuushuwaakka worqqaa tigettaa yuushshi aattiis

English_Sentences: and he made two rings of gold for it under the crown thereof by the two corners of it upon the two sides thereof to be places for the staves to bear it withal
Wolaitta_Sentences: He worqqaa tigettaappe garssaara ixaanaa cuwayiyo saaxiniyaayyo worqqaappe naau sagaayota medhdhiis yaatidi ya baggaaranne ha baggaara naaaa naaaa oittiis Hegeeti tookkiyo wode kasota aattanau maaddanaassa

English_Sentences: and he made the staves of shittim wood and overlaid them with gold
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kasota guuganttaappe kessidi eta worqqan sheeshshiis

English_Sentences: and he made the holy anointing oil and the pure incense of sweet spices according to the work of the apothecary
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi geeshsha tiyettiyo zaitiyaanne sawuwaa tonggu giya loo ixaanaa shittuwaa oottiyo eran giigissiis

English_Sentences: and he made the altar of burnt offering of shittim wood five cubits was the length thereof and five cubits the breadth thereof it was foursquare and three cubits the height thereof
Wolaitta_Sentences: Guuganttaappe xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaa keexxiis He yarshshiyoosaayyo geesai heezzu wara gomppainne zananai issi likke ichchashu ichchashu wara gididi oiddu zooziyaara deiyaagaa oottidosona

English_Sentences: and he made the horns thereof on the four corners of it the horns thereof were of the same and he overlaid it with brass
Wolaitta_Sentences: Oiddu zoozetu wurssetta gaxan gaxan issi issi kaciyaa medhdhiis He kaceti yarshshiyoosaara issippe oiqettidi oosettidosona Yaatin yarshshiyoosaa nahaasiyaa biratan sheeshshiis

English_Sentences: and he made all the vessels of the altar the pots and the shovels and the basons and the fleshhooks and the firepans all the vessels thereof made he of brass
Wolaitta_Sentences: An goettiyo miishshata balddeta akaafata araciyo kuixaarota ashuwaa qaphiyo qaphetanne tama cooceta ubbaa nahaasiyaa birataappe medhdhiis

English_Sentences: and he made for the altar a brasen grate of network under the compass thereof beneath unto the midst of it
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatidi nahaasiyaa birataappe zazzariyaa yarshshiyoosaassi giigissiis giigissidi yarshshiyoosaayyo duge giddo ginan deiya dacaa bolli wottiis

English_Sentences: and he cast four rings for the four ends of the grate of brass to be places for the staves
Wolaitta_Sentences: Nahaasiyaa birataappe medhdhido zazzariyaayyo oiddu zooziyan kasota aattanau oiddu sagaayota medhdhiis

English_Sentences: and he made the staves of shittim wood and overlaid them with brass
Wolaitta_Sentences: Guuganttaappe yarshshiyoosaayyo kasota kessidi nahaasiyaa biratan sheeshshiis

English_Sentences: and he put the staves into the rings on the sides of the altar to bear it withal he made the altar hollow with boards
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yarshshiyoosaa tookkiyo wode maaddana mala ha kasota naau miyyiyaara deiya sagaayotun aattiis Yarshshiyoosaa gidduwaa kofa kessidi xaulaappe medhdhiis

English_Sentences: and he made the laver of brass and the foot of it of brass of the lookingglasses of the women assembling which assembled at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
Wolaitta_Sentences: Nahaasiyaa birataappe meechcha keriyaanne a wottiyoogaa medhdhiis he biratai Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa penggen oottiya maccaasati ehiido heregaappe ekettiis

English_Sentences: and he made the court on the south side southward the hangings of the court were of fine twined linen an hundred cubits
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan dabaabaa giigissiis Dabaabaassi tohossa bagga zananaa xeetu wara oottidi liiqo liinuwaappe dadettida magalashuwaa giigissiis

English_Sentences: their pillars were twenty and their brasen sockets twenty the hooks of the pillars and their fillets were of silver
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ayyo nahaasiyaa birataappe laatamu tuussatanne tuussati eqqiyo nahaase gedeta oottiis eta huuphiyan qassi biraappe merettida kaqqiyoogeetanne tuussata huuphiyan qachchiyoogeeta oottiis

English_Sentences: and for the north side the hangings were an hundred cubits their pillars were twenty and their sockets of brass twenty the hooks of the pillars and their fillets of silver
Wolaitta_Sentences: Dabaabau huuphessa bagga zananai xeetu wara adussa qassi laatamu tuussatinne he tuussatuyyo laatamu nahaasiyaa gedeti deoosona Yaatidi biraappe oosettida kaqqiyoogeetinne tuussatu huuphiyan qachchiyoogeeti deoosona

English_Sentences: and for the west side were hangings of fifty cubits their pillars ten and their sockets ten the hooks of the pillars and their fillets of silver
Wolaitta_Sentences: Arggo bagga dabaabaa gomppai ishatamu wara aaho gididi tammu tuussatinne tuussatuyyo tammu gedeti deiyo magalashota giigissiis he tuussatu huuphiyan biraappe merettida kaqqiyoogeetanne tuussatu huuphiyan qachchiyoogeeta oottiis

English_Sentences: and for the east side eastward fifty cubits
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi arshsho bagga dabaabaa gomppai ishatamu wara aaho

English_Sentences: the hangings of the one side of the gate were fifteen cubits their pillars three and their sockets three
Wolaitta_Sentences: Dabaabaa geliyoosaappe issi baggaara tammanne ichchashu wara aduqqiya magalashoti etayyo heezzu tuussatinne tuussatuyyo heezzu gedeti deoosona

English_Sentences: and for the other side of the court gate on this hand and that hand were hangings of fifteen cubits their pillars three and their sockets three
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka dabaabaa geliyoosaappe hinkko baggaara tammanne ichchashu wara aduqqiya magalashoti etayyo heezzu tuussatinne tuussatuyyo heezzu gedeti deoosona

English_Sentences: all the hangings of the court round about were of fine twined linen
Wolaitta_Sentences: Dabaabaa yuushuwan deiya magalashoti ubbai liiqo liinuwaappe dadettidaageeta

English_Sentences: and the sockets for the pillars were of brass the hooks of the pillars and their fillets of silver and the overlaying of their chapiters of silver and all the pillars of the court were filleted with silver
Wolaitta_Sentences: He tuussatu gedeti nahaasiyaappe kaqqiyoogeetinne tuussatu huuphiyan qachchiyoogeeti biraappe oosettidosona eta huuphee biran sheeshettiis Hegaa gishshau dabaabaa yuushuwan deiya tuussatu ubbaa huuphiyan biraappe oosettida qachchiyoogeeti deoosona

English_Sentences: and the hanging for the gate of the court was needlework of blue and purple and scarlet and fine twined linen and twenty cubits was the length and the height in the breadth was five cubits answerable to the hangings of the court
Wolaitta_Sentences: Dabaabaa geliyoosan kaqqiyo magalashoi salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe daddiyoogaa xilppiyan alleeqissiyaagan giigissidoogaa Ayyo zananai laatamu wara geesai dabaabaa magalashotu likke ichchashu wara

English_Sentences: and their pillars were four and their sockets of brass four their hooks of silver and the overlaying of their chapiters and their fillets of silver
Wolaitta_Sentences: Nahaasiyaa birataappe oosettida oiddu tuussatinne tuussatussi oiddu gedeti deoosona Eta kaqqiyoogeetinne tuussatu huuphiyan qachchiyoogeeti biraappe oosettidosona eta huuphetikka biran sheeshettidosona

English_Sentences: and all the pins of the tabernacle and of the court round about were of brass
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa xisheti ubbainne a yuushuwan deiya dabaabaa xisheti ubbai nahaasiyaa birataappe oosettidaageeta

English_Sentences: this is the sum of the tabernacle even of the tabernacle of testimony as it was counted according to the commandment of moses for the service of the levites by the hand of ithamar son to aaron the priest
Wolaitta_Sentences: Dunkkaaniyau Maachchaa Dunkkaaniyau goettido miishshata Leewati mazggaban xaafidosona He miishshata qeesiyaa Aaroona naaa Itaamaara halaqatettaa garssan deiya Leewati mazggaban xaafanaadan Muusee azaziis

English_Sentences: and bezaleel the son of uri the son of hur of the tribe of judah made all that the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Biniyaama zare gidiya Hoora naaa naaa Uura naaa Baxaalieeli GODAI Muusa azazido ubbaa oottiis

English_Sentences: and with him was aholiab son of ahisamach of the tribe of dan an engraver and a cunning workman and an embroiderer in blue and in purple and in scarlet and fine linen
Wolaitta_Sentences: Daana zare gidida Ahisamaaka naaa Oholiaabi aara deees i kushe hiillanchchanne oottiyoobaassi koiro halchchuwaa kessiyaagaa qassi salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaaninne liiqo liinuwan daddidi xilppiyan alleeqissiya asa

English_Sentences: all the gold that was occupied for the work in all the work of the holy place even the gold of the offering was twenty and nine talents and seven hundred and thirty shekels after the shekel of the sanctuary
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa oosuwaayyo GODAASSI imettida worqqai Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyan eriyo meezaanan wottin issi shau kilo giraame deexxiis

English_Sentences: and the silver of them that were numbered of the congregation was an hundred talents and a thousand seven hundred and threescore and fifteen shekels after the shekel of the sanctuary
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qoodan deiya maabaraa asaappe beettida birai Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyan eriyo meezaanan wottin kilo giraame deexxiis

English_Sentences: a bekah for every man that is half a shekel after the shekel of the sanctuary for every one that went to be numbered from twenty years old and upward for six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty men
Wolaitta_Sentences: Asaa qoodiyo wode qoodettida attuma asai ubbai huuphiyan huuphiyan Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyan eriyo meezaanan wottin usuppun giraame keenaa immiis Qoodettida asai laatamu laitta kumidoogeenne laatamaappe bollaara deiyaagee muleera

English_Sentences: and of the hundred talents of silver were cast the sockets of the sanctuary and the sockets of the vail an hundred sockets of the hundred talents a talent for a socket
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa magalashota essido xeetu gedeti kilo giraame tigiyo biran oosettidosona Hegeekka issi issi gediyaassi hasttamanne oiddu kilo giraame tigiyo bira

English_Sentences: and of the thousand seven hundred seventy and five shekels he made hooks for the pillars and overlaid their chapiters and filleted them
Wolaitta_Sentences: Attida hasttamu kilo giraame tigiyo biraa tuussatun kaqqiyoogeeta medhdhanau tuussatu huuphiyan sheeshshanaunne eta huuphiyan qachchiyoogeeta medhdhanau goettidosona

English_Sentences: and the brass of the offering was seventy talents and two thousand and four hundred shekels
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka asai GODAASSI ehiido nahaase biratai kilo giraame

English_Sentences: and therewith he made the sockets to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation and the brasen altar and the brasen grate for it and all the vessels of the altar
Wolaitta_Sentences: He nahaasiyaa birataappe Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyoosan eqqiya tuussatu gedeti nahaasiyaa yarshshiyoosaa giyo yarshshiyoosai a giddon hiixxido nahaase zazzareenne a giddon goettiyo dumma dumma miishsha ubbai merettiis

English_Sentences: and the sockets of the court round about and the sockets of the court gate and all the pins of the tabernacle and all the pins of the court round about
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi dabaabaa yuushuwan deiya dirssaanne geliyoosaa penggee eqqido gedeti qassi Xoossaa Dunkkaaneenne a yuushuwan deiya dabaabaa dirssai tolettido xisheti ubbai he nahaase birataappe merettidosona

English_Sentences: and of the blue and purple and scarlet they made cloths of service to do service in the holy place and made the holy garments for aaron as the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qeeseti Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyan oottiyo wode maayana maayuwaa salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappe daddidosona Aarooni maayiyo qeesetettaa maayuwaakka GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan oottidosona

English_Sentences: and he made the ephod of gold blue and purple and scarlet and fine twined linen
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi eti eefuudiyaa worqqaappe salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe daddidosona

English_Sentences: and they did beat the gold into thin plates and cut it into wires to work it in the blue and in the purple and in the scarlet and in the fine linen with cunning work
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti worqqaa qoxxidi leeiyan yeechchayidi appe qaraari qaraaridi qacina kessidosona Yaatidi salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaanne liiqo liinuwaa gattidi kushe hiillanchchati daddidosona

English_Sentences: they made shoulderpieces for it to couple it together by the two edges was it coupled together
Wolaitta_Sentences: Naau baggai gaittidi issuwaa gidana mala naau hashiyaa bolli gattidi oittiya carqqiyaa giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and the curious girdle of his ephod that was upon it was of the same according to the work thereof of gold blue and purple and scarlet and fine twined linen as the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan hiillai alleeqissidi daddido danccoikka eefuudiyaa mala gididi worqqaappe salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe dadettiis

English_Sentences: and they wrought onyx stones inclosed in ouches of gold graven as signets are graven with the names of the children of israel
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti maragidiyaa giyo naau shuchchata giigissidi worqqaappe medhdhido shuchchaa oiqqiyaagaa bolli maaraara wottidosona Maatafaa bolli sunttaa woocidi xaafiyoogaadan he shuchchatu bolli Israaeeliyaa naatu sunttaa woocidi xaafidosona

English_Sentences: and he put them on the shoulders of the ephod that they should be stones for a memorial to the children of israel as the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan tammanne naau Israaeela zareta hassayiyoobaa gidana mala ha tammanne naau shuchchata eefuudiyaara oittido hashiyaa carqqiyan wottidosona

English_Sentences: and he made the breastplate of cunning work like the work of the ephod of gold blue and purple and scarlet and fine twined linen
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti tiran wottiyoogaa kushe hiillanchchan oottidosona He tiran wottiyoogaa eefuudiyaa worqqaappe daddidoogaadan salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe daddidosona

English_Sentences: it was foursquare they made the breastplate double a span was the length thereof and a span the breadth thereof being doubled
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ayyo oiddu zoozee deees geesainne gomppai issi issi takkaaro yaanidaagaa dakkoyidosona

English_Sentences: and they set in it four rows of stones the first row was a sardius a topaz and a carbuncle this was the first row
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan a bolli oiddu maaran alo shuchchata wottidosona koiro maaran wottido shuchchai sarddiyoona tophaaziyooniyaanne phooliya inqquwaa

English_Sentences: and the second row an emerald a sapphire and a diamond
Wolaitta_Sentences: naaantto maaran baluura sampperiyaanne almmaaziyaa giyo alo shuchchata

English_Sentences: and the third row a ligure an agate and an amethyst
Wolaitta_Sentences: heezzantto maaran yaakinttiyaa kelqqedooniyaanne ametesxxinoosiyaa

English_Sentences: and the fourth row a beryl an onyx and a jasper they were inclosed in ouches of gold in their inclosings
Wolaitta_Sentences: oiddantta maaran biralle maragidiyaanne yasphphiidiyaa Hegeeta ubbaa worqqaappe oosettida shuchchaa oiqqiyoogaa bolli wottidosona

English_Sentences: and the stones were according to the names of the children of israel twelve according to their names like the engravings of a signet every one with his name according to the twelve tribes
Wolaitta_Sentences: Israaeela naatu sunttaa qoodaadan shuchchatu qoodaikka tammanne naaa issoi issoi maatafaadan woocettidi tammanne naau zaretu sunttai he shuchchatun xaafettiis

English_Sentences: and they made upon the breastplate chains at the ends of wreathen work of pure gold
Wolaitta_Sentences: Tiran wottiyoogaayyo wodorodan dooqettida sanssalataa walahi bainna worqqaappe medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and they made two ouches of gold and two gold rings and put the two rings in the two ends of the breastplate
Wolaitta_Sentences: Naau worqqaappe medhdhido shuchchaa oiqqiyaageeta oottidosona yaatidi naau worqqa migidota medhdhidoogeeta tiran wottiyoogaayyo qommo gaxa zoozetuura gattidi oisettidosona

English_Sentences: and they put the two wreathen chains of gold in the two rings on the ends of the breastplate
Wolaitta_Sentences: He naau worqqa sanssalatata tiran wottiyoogaayyo zoozetun deiya migidotuura gatti oittidosona

English_Sentences: and the two ends of the two wreathen chains they fastened in the two ouches and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod before it
Wolaitta_Sentences: He sanssalatatuyyo hankko bagga xeeraa qassi eefuudiyaayyo sintta baggaara hashiyaa carqqiyan deiya shuchchaa oiqqiyoogeetuura gatti qachchidosona

English_Sentences: and they made two rings of gold and put them on the two ends of the breastplate upon the border of it which was on the side of the ephod inward
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassikka naau worqqa migidota medhdhidi eefuudiyaappe kaallidi deiya tiran wottiyoogaayyo so baggaara deiya naau zoozetu xeeran aattidosona

English_Sentences: and they made two other golden rings and put them on the two sides of the ephod underneath toward the forepart of it over against the other coupling thereof above the curious girdle of the ephod
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka worqqaappe hara naau migidota medhdhidi eefuudiyaayyo sintta baggaara hashiyaa carqqiyaappe garssa baggaara eefuudiyaa xeessan qachchiyoogaappe qommoora sihoi gaittosaa matan eta oittidosona

English_Sentences: and they did bind the breastplate by his rings unto the rings of the ephod with a lace of blue that it might be above the curious girdle of the ephod and that the breastplate might not be loosed from the ephod as the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan tiran wottiyoogan deiya migidota eefuudiyan deiya migidotuura gattidi salo milatiya baqettan qachchidosona qachchin tiran wottiyoogee xeessaappe qommoora deiyo gishshau qashoi dolenna

English_Sentences: and he made the robe of the ephod of woven work all of blue
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eefuudiyaappe bollaara maayiyo adussa maayuwaa eti muleera salo milatiya carqqiyaappe giigissidosona hegee shimainne ooso

English_Sentences: and there was an hole in the midst of the robe as the hole of an habergeon with a band round about the hole that it should not rend
Wolaitta_Sentences: He adussa maayuwaayyo qooriyaa aattiyoosaa medhdhidosona he sohoi peerettennaadan soo qalamidi yuushshi aattidi sikkidosona

English_Sentences: and they made upon the hems of the robe pomegranates of blue and purple and scarlet and twined linen
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti adussa maayuwaa duge bagga macaraa yuushuwan salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe roomaaniyaa teeraa misileta medhdhidosona

English_Sentences: and they made bells of pure gold and put the bells between the pomegranates upon the hem of the robe round about between the pomegranates
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti qassi worqqaappe daalata medhdhidi adussa maayuwau duge bagga gaxaa yuushshi aattidi roomaane misiletu gidduwan walahan aattidosona

English_Sentences: a bell and a pomegranate a bell and a pomegranate round about the hem of the robe to minister in as the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti he maayuwaayyo duge bagga macaraa yuushshi aattidi daalaanne roomaaniyaa teeraa misiliyaa walakkidi aattidosona Hegee GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan eti Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa oosuwaa oottiiddi maayanaassa

English_Sentences: and they made coats of fine linen of woven work for aaron and for his sons
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan eti Aaroonayyoonne a naatuyyo shimainnee daddido liiqo liinuwaappe qoleta giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and a mitre of fine linen and goodly bonnets of fine linen and linen breeches of fine twined linen
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi huuphiyan xaaxiyo shaasheta qophetanne garssaara maayiyo maayota liiqo liinuwaappe daddidi giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and a girdle of fine twined linen and blue and purple and scarlet of needlework as the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi eti salo milatiya ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zoo qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe daddidi kushe hiillan alleeqissidi danccuwaa giigissidosona

English_Sentences: and they made the plate of the holy crown of pure gold and wrote upon it a writing like to the engravings of a signet holiness to the lord
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti akiliiliyaa misiliyaa walahi bainna worqqaappe medhdhidi maatafaa bolli woociyoogaadan a bolli GODAASSI GEESHSHA GIDIDI DUMMATIIS yaagiyaagaa woocidi xaafidosona

English_Sentences: and they tied unto it a lace of blue to fasten it on high upon the mitre as the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan huuphiyan shaashiya bolli kaqqanaadan GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan salo milatiya baqettaa an aattidi qachchidosona

English_Sentences: thus was all the work of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation finished and the children of israel did according to all that the lord commanded moses so did they
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa oosoi ubbai muleera polettiis Israaeelati ubbabaakka GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan oottidosona

English_Sentences: and they brought the tabernacle unto moses the tent and all his furniture his taches his boards his bars and his pillars and his sockets
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan eti Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa muleera ekkidi Muusekko ehiidosona hegeekka dunkkaaniyaanne a miishsha ubbaa qapheta xagaageta hiraqota tuussatanne eti eqqiyo gedeta

English_Sentences: and the covering of rams skins dyed red and the covering of badgers skins and the vail of the covering
Wolaitta_Sentences: bolla kamaassi dorssa orggiyaa calaa zoo qalamiyan yeggi kessidoogaa irppaniyaa genttiyo magalashuwaa

English_Sentences: the ark of the testimony and the staves thereof and the mercy seat
Wolaitta_Sentences: Maachchaa Taabootaa a tookkiyo kasotanne atto giyo sohuwaa qumuwaa

English_Sentences: the table and all the vessels thereof and the shewbread
Wolaitta_Sentences: xaraphpheezaanne a miishshaa ubbaa GODAA sinttan wottiyo geeshsha oittaa

English_Sentences: the pure candlestick with the lamps thereof even with the lamps to be set in order and all the vessels thereof and the oil for light
Wolaitta_Sentences: walahi bainna worqqaappe oosettida xomppiyaa wottiyo ballaanne an maaran deiya xomppeta eta miishshata ubbaanne xomppiyaa zaitiyaa

English_Sentences: and the golden altar and the anointing oil and the sweet incense and the hanging for the tabernacle door
Wolaitta_Sentences: ixaanaa cuwayiyo worqqa saaxiniyaa tiyettiyo zaitiyaa sawiya ixaanaa Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa penggiyaa magalashuwaa

English_Sentences: the brasen altar and his grate of brass his staves and all his vessels the laver and his foot
Wolaitta_Sentences: nahaasiyaappe oottido yarshshiyoosaa a nahaasiyaa zazzariyaara a tookkiyo kasota a miishshata ubbaa meechcha keriyaanne a wottiyoogaa

English_Sentences: the hangings of the court his pillars and his sockets and the hanging for the court gate his cords and his pins and all the vessels of the service of the tabernacle for the tent of the congregation
Wolaitta_Sentences: dabaabaa godaa gennttiyo magalashota a tuussata eti eqqiyo gedeta dabaabaa geliyo penggetu magalashota dabaabaa wodorotanne xisheta Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaayyo koshshiya miishshata ubbaa

English_Sentences: the cloths of service to do service in the holy place and the holy garments for aaron the priest and his sons garments to minister in the priests office
Wolaitta_Sentences: qeeseti Geeshsha sohuwan oottiidi maayanau dadettida maayota Aarooninne a naati qeesetettaa oottiiddi maayiyo maayota

English_Sentences: according to all that the lord commanded moses so the children of israel made all the work
Wolaitta_Sentences: Israaeelati ooso ubbaakka GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan oottidosona

English_Sentences: and moses did look upon all the work and behold they had done it as the lord had commanded even so had they done it and moses blessed them
Wolaitta_Sentences: Oottin Muusee oosuwaa xomoosi xeellidi eti GODAI azazidoogaadan oottidoogaa beiis Hegaa gishshau Muusee eta anjjiis

English_Sentences: and the lord spake unto moses saying
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Muusa

English_Sentences: on the first day of the first month shalt thou set up the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation
Wolaitta_Sentences: Koiro aginaayyo koiro gallassi neeni Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa tola

English_Sentences: and thou shalt put therein the ark of the testimony and cover the ark with the vail
Wolaitta_Sentences: Maachchaa Taabootaa a giddon wotta wottada he Taabootaa magalashuwan kamma

English_Sentences: and thou shalt bring in the table and set in order the things that are to be set in order upon it and thou shalt bring in the candlestick and light the lamps thereof
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xaraphpheezaa gelissada a bolli wodhdhanau koshshiya miishshata ubbaa a bolli wotta Yaatada xomppeta wottiyo ballaa soo gelissada a bolli xomppeta wotta

English_Sentences: and thou shalt set the altar of gold for the incense before the ark of the testimony and put the hanging of the door to the tabernacle
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ixaanaa cuwayiyo worqqa saaxiniyaa Maachchaa Taabootaa sinttaara wottada Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo magalashuwaa kaqqa

English_Sentences: and thou shalt set the altar of the burnt offering before the door of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaa Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa sinttaara wotta

English_Sentences: and thou shalt set the laver between the tent of the congregation and the altar and shalt put water therein
Wolaitta_Sentences: Meechcha keriyaa Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaappenne yarshshiyoosaappe gidduwan wottada an haattaa tiga

English_Sentences: and thou shalt set up the court round about and hang up the hanging at the court gate
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaappe kareera yuushsha aattada dabaabaa giigissa giigissada dabaabaa geliyoosan magalashuwaa kaqqa

English_Sentences: and thou shalt take the anointing oil and anoint the tabernacle and all that is therein and shalt hallow it and all the vessels thereof and it shall be holy
Wolaitta_Sentences: Tiyiyo zaitiyaa ekkada Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaanne a giddon deiya ubbabaa tiya anne a giddon goettiyo miishsha ubbaa dummaya yaatobare i geeshsha gidana

English_Sentences: and thou shalt anoint the altar of the burnt offering and all his vessels and sanctify the altar and it shall be an altar most holy
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaanne au goettiyo miishsha ubbaa tiya yarshshiyoosaa dummaya yaatobare i ubbaappe aadhdhiya geeshsha gidana

English_Sentences: and thou shalt anoint the laver and his foot and sanctify it
Wolaitta_Sentences: Meechcha keriyaanne a utissiyo miishshaa tiya tiyada eta dummaya

English_Sentences: and thou shalt bring aaron and his sons unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation and wash them with water
Wolaitta_Sentences: Neeni Aaroonanne a naata Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo pengge ehaada haattan eta meecca

English_Sentences: and thou shalt put upon aaron the holy garments and anoint him and sanctify him that he may minister unto me in the priests office
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan qeesetettaa maayuwaa Aaroona maizzada i taayyo qeesetettan oottanaadan a tiyada dummaya

English_Sentences: and thou shalt bring his sons and clothe them with coats
Wolaitta_Sentences: A attuma naatakka ehaada qoliyaa maizza

English_Sentences: and thou shalt anoint them as thou didst anoint their father that they may minister unto me in the priests office for their anointing shall surely be an everlasting priesthood throughout their generations
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti taayyo qeesetettan oottanaadan eta aawaa tiyidoogaadan etakka tiya Eta tiyettai etakka eta sintta yeletaa ubbaa qeese oottiyaagaa yaagiis

English_Sentences: thus did moses according to all that the lord commanded him so did he
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin Muusee ubbabaakka GODAI bana azazidoogaadan oottiis

English_Sentences: and it came to pass in the first month in the second year on the first day of the month that the tabernacle was reared up
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Gibxxeppe eti kiyido naaantta laittan koiro aginaayyo koiro gallassan Xoossaa Dunkkaanee tolettiis

English_Sentences: and moses reared up the tabernacle and fastened his sockets and set up the boards thereof and put in the bars thereof and reared up his pillars
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa essiyo wode gedeta eta sohuwan sohuwan wottiis xagaagetanne tuussaa aattiis hiraqotakka gelissiis

English_Sentences: and he spread abroad the tent over the tabernacle and put the covering of the tent above upon it as the lord commanded moses
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Muusee GODAI azazidoogaadan ha essidoogaa bollan dunkkaaniyaa toliis he toliyaa bollan kamuwaa kammiis

English_Sentences: and he took and put the testimony into the ark and set the staves on the ark and put the mercy seat above upon the ark
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatidi tammu azazoti xaafettido masettida shuchchatu qaalaa efiidi Taabootaa giddon wottiis tookkiyo kasota Taabootan aattiis atto giyo sohuwaa qumuwaa Taabootaa bolli wottiis

English_Sentences: and he brought the ark into the tabernacle and set up the vail of the covering and covered the ark of the testimony as the lord commanded moses
